title: Runes not showing up
body: Just bought some runes,  they aren't showing up, i even waited a few days. Help!

replies.body:
The ones that are missing: http://prntscr.com/glwed6

And the screenshot that i dont have them: http://prntscr.com/glwerq

It looks like all of the runes have been added correctly going back a month, which runes specifically did you think you were missing? Make sure that you click on the 'Glyphs/Marks/Seals' drop down menu to make sure you can see all of your runes.

If you still don't see the ones you're looking for, shoot me a screenshot of your rune menus.
